summary: Request to expose individual RPC services through the SDK Connection interface. This issue was superseded by a SDK rewrite and is no longer applicable to the current codebase.
userImpact: Users cannot directly access individual RPC services through the Connection API.
resolutionDetails: SDK underwent rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
